newsitem.title: LEBANON: Lebanon awards $102 mln port deal to Spanish firm.
newsitem.headline: Lebanon awards $102 mln port deal to Spanish firm.

text.p: The port of Beirut awarded Entracanales y Tavora of Spain a $102.8 million project to renovate the war-damaged facility, port chairman Antoine Rayes said on Friday.
"We decided to award the contract to Spanish Entracanales y Tavora as it submitted the lowest bid," Rayes said.
He expected work on the three-year renovation project to begin in November. The European Investment Bank (EIB) had offered a $54 million loan to help in financing it.

The project includes building a container station, two 280-metres (yards) long quays, adding the breakwater and paving and asphalting roads and open areas totalling 700,000 square meters. Water, electricity and telephone networks will also be upgraded.
Other bids by international firms had ranged between $111 million and $144 million.
Rayes named the other firms as:
-Hojgaard & Shultz A.S. & E Pihl & Soen A.S.(Denmark)
